questions.question: Identify the grammatical function of the word 'quickly' in the sentence: 'She quickly finished her homework.'
Which of the following sentences uses the subjunctive mood correctly?
options: If I was rich, I would travel the world.
I wish he was here now.
If he were taller, he could reach the shelf.
If I would be you, Iâ€™d take the job.
questions.answer: If he were taller, he could reach the shelf.
